author: marvin
msg: LUCY-158 Disable LockFreeRegistry test by default.
The LockFreeRegistry test depends on Perl ithreads, which are not rock-solid
reliable everywhere.  Disable it except when LUCY_DEBUG is defined so that we

author: marvin
msg: LUCY-157 Add -pthread link flag on OpenBSD.
OpenBSD has userland pthreads.  If we don't supply the "-pthread" flag to the
linker, then lazy binding of symbols from pthread.h fails.
